abstract: Performers and celebrities at Billboard Music Awards in Las Vegas don edgy and personalized outfits that counter polished red carpet look.

headline.print_headline: The Las Vegas Aesthetic: Lots of Skin
headline.main: At Billboard Awards, a Red Carpet That’s More Vegas Strip Than Runway

snippet: If the Oscars red carpet features celebrities as pawns in a high-fashion game, this event revealed rock stars dressed — well, seemingly by themselves.
lead_paragraph: If the Oscars red carpet features celebrities as pawns in a high-fashion game, this event revealed rock stars dressed — well, seemingly by themselves.
